titleStmt.title: Dr. John Owen's two short catechisms wherein the principles of the doctine of Christ are unfolded and explained : proper for all persons to learn before they be admitted to the Sacrament of the Lord's Supper, and composed by him for the use of all congregations in general.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for, and sold by Will. Marshal ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
